com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan

Class AbstractStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.AbstractStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Element, Interruptible, Step
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeploymentStep, TLSCleanupStep, UninstallStep

    public abstract class AbstractStep
extends java.lang.Object
implements Step
    Provides a default implementation of commonly-used Step logic.

      • interrupt

        public void interrupt()
        Description copied from interface: Interruptible
        A call to interrupt indicates to an Interruptible that it should not continue work beyond the current point, until Interruptible.proceed() is called. This call has no effect if the object is already interrupted.
        Specified by:
        interrupt in interface Interruptible

      • proceed

        public void proceed()
        Description copied from interface: Interruptible
        A call to proceed indicates to an Interruptible that it should may cancel a previous Interruptible.interrupt() call and resume with any in-progress work. This call has no effect if the object is already proceeding.
        Specified by:
        proceed in interface Interruptible

      • restart

        public void restart()
        Restarts the step involves two steps: 1. Reset delay for any of its given tasks. 2. Set its status back to Status.PENDING.
        Specified by:
        restart in interface Element
